GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Get the type of this class.

AddText.name: AddText
AddText.description: Add some text to the element.

params.name: sText
params.description: The text that we want to insert into the current document element.

AddPageBreak.name: AddPageBreak
AddPageBreak.description: Add page break and start the next element from the next page.

AddLineBreak.name: AddLineBreak
AddLineBreak.description: Add line break to the current position and start the next element from a new line.

AddColumnBreak.name: AddColumnBreak
AddColumnBreak.description: Add column break to the current position and start the next element from a new column.

AddPageNumber.name: AddPageNumber
AddPageNumber.description: Insert the number of the current document page into the paragraph.<note>This method works for the paragraphs in the document header/footer only.</note>

AddPagesCount.name: AddPagesCount
AddPagesCount.description: Insert the number of pages in the current document into the paragraph.<note>This method works for the paragraphs in the document header/footer only.</note>

GetParagraphMarkTextPr.name: GetParagraphMarkTextPr
GetParagraphMarkTextPr.description: Get the text properties of the paragraph mark which is used to mark the paragraph end. The mark can also acquirecommon text properties like bold, italic, underline, etc.

GetNumbering.name: GetNumbering
GetNumbering.description: Get a numbering definition and numbering level for the numbered list.

SetNumbering.name: SetNumbering
SetNumbering.description: Specifies that the current paragraph references a numbering definition instance in the current document.

GetElementsCount.name: GetElementsCount
GetElementsCount.description: Get the number of elements in the current paragraph.

GetElement.name: GetElement
GetElement.description: Get the element of the paragraph using the position specified.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The position where the element which content we want to get must be located.

RemoveElement.name: RemoveElement
RemoveElement.description: Remove the element using the position specified. Since we don't make an invalid document an empty run willbe added to the paragraph if we have deleted the last element.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The position of the element which we want to remove in the paragraph.

RemoveAllElements.name: RemoveAllElements
RemoveAllElements.description: Remove all elements from the current paragraph. Since we don't make an invalid document an empty run willbe added to the paragraph.

Copy.name: Copy
Copy.description: Create a copy of the paragraph. Ingonore comments, footnote references, complex fields

AddElement.name: AddElement
AddElement.description: Add an element to the current paragraph.

params.name: oElement
params.description: The document element which will be added at the current position. Returns false if thetype of oElement is not supported by a paragraph.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The number of the paragraph where the current element will be added. If this value is notspecified then the element will be added at the end of the current paragraph.

AddTabStop.name: AddTabStop
AddTabStop.description: Add a tab stop to the current paragraph.

AddDrawing.name: AddDrawing
AddDrawing.description: Add an object (image, shape or chart) to the current paragraph.

params.name: oDrawing
params.description: The object which will be added to the current paragraph.

params.name: oSdt
params.description: if undefined or null, then new class ApiInlineLvlSdt will be created and added to paragraph.

SetStyle.name: SetStyle
SetStyle.description: The paragraph style base method.<note>This method is not used by itself, as it only forms the basis for the {@link ApiParagraph#SetStyle} method which sets the selected or created style for the paragraph.</note>

params.name: oStyle
params.description: The style of the paragraph to be set.

SetContextualSpacing.name: SetContextualSpacing
SetContextualSpacing.description: Specifies that any space specified before or after this paragraph, specified using the spacing element{@link ApiParaPr#SetSpacingBefore}{@link ApiParaPr#SetSpacingAfter}, should not be applied when the preceding andfollowing paragraphs are of the same paragraph style, affecting the top and bottom spacing respectively.

params.name: isContextualSpacing
params.description: The true value will enable the paragraph contextual spacing.

SetIndLeft.name: SetIndLeft
SetIndLeft.description: Set the paragraph left side indentation.

params.name: nValue
params.description: The paragraph left side indentation value measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

SetIndRight.name: SetIndRight
SetIndRight.description: Set the paragraph right side indentation.

params.name: nValue
params.description: The paragraph right side indentation value measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

SetIndFirstLine.name: SetIndFirstLine
SetIndFirstLine.description: Set the paragraph first line indentation.

params.name: nValue
params.description: The paragraph first line indentation value measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

params.name: sJc
params.description: The parameters will define the justification type thatwill be applied to the paragraph contents.

SetKeepLines.name: SetKeepLines
SetKeepLines.description: Specify that when rendering this document using a page view, all lines of this paragraph are maintained on a single page whenever possible.

params.name: isKeepLines
params.description: The true value will enable the option to keep lines of the paragraph on a single page.

SetKeepNext.name: SetKeepNext
SetKeepNext.description: Specify that when rendering this document using a paginated view, the contents of this paragraph are at leastpartly rendered on the same page as the following paragraph whenever possible.

params.name: isKeepNext
params.description: The true value will enable the option to keep lines of the paragraph on the samepage as the following paragraph.

SetPageBreakBefore.name: SetPageBreakBefore
SetPageBreakBefore.description: Specify that when rendering this document using a paginated view, the contents of this paragraph are rendered atthe beginning of a new page in the document.

params.name: isPageBreakBefore
params.description: The true value will enable the option to render the contents of the paragraphat the beginning of the a new page in the document.

SetSpacingLine.name: SetSpacingLine
SetSpacingLine.description: Set paragraph line spacing. If the value of the sLineRule parameter is either "atLeast" or "exact", then the value of nLine shall be interpreted as twentieths of a point. If the value of the sLineRule parameter is "auto", then the value of the nLine attribute shall be interpreted as 240ths of a line.

params.name: nLine
params.description: The line spacing value measured either in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch) or in 240ths of a line.

params.name: sLineRule
params.description: The rule that determines the measuring units of the nLine parameter.

SetSpacingBefore.name: SetSpacingBefore
SetSpacingBefore.description: Set paragraph spacing before. If the value of the isBeforeAuto parameter is true, then any value of the nBefore is ignored. If isBeforeAuto parameter is not specified, then it will be interpreted as false.

params.name: nBefore
params.description: The value of the spacing before the current paragraph measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

params.name: isBeforeAuto
params.description: The true value will disable the nBefore parameter.

SetSpacingAfter.name: SetSpacingAfter
SetSpacingAfter.description: Set paragraph spacing after. If the value of the isAfterAuto parameter is true, then any value of the nAfter is ignored. If isAfterAuto parameter is not specified, then it will be interpreted as false.

params.name: nAfter
params.description: The value of the spacing after the current paragraph measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

params.name: isAfterAuto
params.description: The true value will disable the nAfter parameter.

SetShd.name: SetShd
SetShd.description: Specify the shading applied to the contents of the paragraph.

params.name: sType
params.description: The shading type which will be applied to the contents of the current paragraph.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

params.name: isAuto
params.description: The true value will disable paragraph contents shading.

SetBottomBorder.name: SetBottomBorder
SetBottomBorder.description: Specify the border which will be displayed below a set of paragraphs which have the same paragraph border settings.<note>The paragraphs of the same style going one by one are considered as a single block, so the border is addedto the whole block rather than to every paragraph in this block.</note>

params.name: sType
params.description: The border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current bottom border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset below the paragraph measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetLeftBorder.name: SetLeftBorder
SetLeftBorder.description: Specify the border which will be displayed at the left side of the page around the specified paragraph.

params.name: sType
params.description: The style of border.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current left border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset to the left of the paragraph measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetRightBorder.name: SetRightBorder
SetRightBorder.description: Specify the border which will be displayed at the right side of the page around the specified paragraph.

params.name: sType
params.description: The border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current right border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset to the right of the paragraph measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetTopBorder.name: SetTopBorder
SetTopBorder.description: Specify the border which will be displayed above a set of paragraphs which have the same set of paragraph border settings.<note>The paragraphs of the same style going one by one are considered as a single block, so the border is added to the whole block rather than to every paragraph in this block.</note>

params.name: sType
params.description: The border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current top border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset above the paragraph measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetBetweenBorder.name: SetBetweenBorder
SetBetweenBorder.description: Specify the border which will be displayed between each paragraph in a set of paragraphs which have the same set of paragraph border settings.

params.name: sType
params.description: The border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset between the paragraphs measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetWidowControl.name: SetWidowControl
SetWidowControl.description: Specify whether a single line of this paragraph will be prevented from being displayed on a separate page from the remaining content at display time by moving the line onto the following page.

params.name: isWidowControl
params.description: The true value will enable the SetWidowControl method use.

SetTabs.name: SetTabs
SetTabs.description: Specifies a sequence of custom tab stops which shall be used for any tab characters in the current paragraph. Warning: The lengths of aPos array and aVal array MUST BE equal.

params.name: aPos
params.description: An array of the positions of custom tab stops with respect to the current page marginsmeasured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

params.name: aVal
params.description: An array of the styles of custom tab stops, which determines the behavior of the tabstop and the alignment which will be applied to text entered at the current custom tab stop.

SetNumPr.name: SetNumPr
SetNumPr.description: Specify that the current paragraph references a numbering definition instance in the current document.

params.name: oNumPr
params.description: Specifies a numbering definition.

params.name: nLvl
params.description: Specifies a numbering level reference. If the current instance of the ApiParaPr class is directformatting of a paragraph, then this parameter MUST BE specified. Otherwise if the current instance of the ApiParaPr classis the part of ApiStyle properties, this parameter will be ignored.

SetBullet.name: SetBullet
SetBullet.description: Set the bullet or numbering to the current paragraph.

params.name: oBullet
params.description: The bullet object created using either the {@link Api#CreateBullet} or {@link Api#CreateNumbering} method.
